definitions: The end part of a sleeve, where the material is turned back or a separate band is sewn on.
A band of cloth at the end of a sleeve, around the wrist.
A fold or band at the bottom of a pant leg.
A slap or strike, especially with an open hand.
examples: She adjusted the cuffs of her sleeves.
The trousers had a neatly sewn cuff.
He received a cuff on the back of his head.
